# incident_incident_types (Data Source)

This data source provides a list of incident types.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example usage of the incident_incident_types data source

# Get all incident types
data "incident_incident_types" "all" {}

# Output the incident types
output "incident_types" {
  description = "List of all incident types"
  value       = data.incident_incident_types.all.incident_types
}

output "incident_type_names" {
  description = "Names of all incident types"
  value       = [for it in data.incident_incident_types.all.incident_types : it.name]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `incident_types` (Attributes List) List of incident types. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--incident_types))

<a id="nestedatt--incident_types"></a>
### Nested Schema for `incident_types`

Read-Only:

- `create_in_triage` (String) Whether incidents of this must always, or can optionally, be created in triage
- `created_at` (String) When this resource was created
- `description` (String) What is this incident type for?
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for this Incident Type
- `is_default` (Boolean) The default Incident Type is used when no other type is explicitly specified
- `name` (String) The name of this Incident Type
- `private_incidents_only` (Boolean) Should all incidents created with this Incident Type be private?
- `updated_at` (String) When this resource was last updated
